extent: Iraqi exile Hatem Mukhliss
Sentence: Iraqi exile Hatem Mukhliss quoted President John F. Kennedy 's exhortation , `` Ask not what your country can do for you , but what you can do for your country , '' and called on Iraqis to write a constitution , establish a legal system and consider what role the army should play .
